ComicInfo.Summary: Here's a twist. Or two. Warren (Stormwatch) Ellis and Steve (Preacher) Dillon bring the Gen13 kids to London and drop them into an odd little drinking hole called the Wolfshead Pub. If you've been reading Stormwatch, you've encountered this place already. If you haven't, shame on you! The Gen13ers apparently haven't, or they'd have known to steer clear of the joint. But they're inside now, and in for the adventure of their lives.
ComicInfo.Title: London's Brilliant
